name: Modular Interoperability: let's get to 1 standard, before there are 15
description: Charly and Susannah explain to you a modular framework for understanding and talking about interoperability, and try to convince you to participate in the creation of a single standard for one layer in this modular framework (hint: the corollary being TCP/IP)

speakers.name: Susannah Evans
speakers.bio: Susannah is the product lead for the IBC team at Interchain
